Desc.entry: Sheffield City Council section which provides access to rehousing for people aged 16 years and over who are homeless under the terms of the Housing Act 1996. All applicants will be given an initial interview to assess basic homelessness, vulnerability and eligibility for assistance. This includes a housing options interview to look at all options for rehousing with a Housing Solutions Officer. Customers are expected to attend with all relevant documents.
